name: Polar (MrSchlag)
description:
Game create for LudumDare 46 in 48h, theme "Keep it alive"

The goal is to save the bear from drawning by bringing iceberg close to him.

- Use ZQSD or WQSD to move around

- Use MOUSE DRAG as a slingshoot to move icebergs

Try your best to keep him alive, Have fun !

The bear is slow, he waits 2 seconds before jumping and he never goes back on previous icebergs !!
